channel.title: Researches on Craft Design Reasearch Lab
channel.description: Recent content in Researches on Craft Design Reasearch Lab

item.title: Bamboo woven structure
item.description: Transferring implicit bamboo weaving craft knowledge to explicit architectural design application through computational design methods

item.title: Metal Folding Craft
item.description: Transforming traditional “white steel” craft knowledge into modern comprehension in its architectural application featuring various unique joints

item.title: Ventilation Block in Hong Kong
item.description: Reimagining craft and design of perforated blocks in subtropical urban context with contemporary technology
